00023 #ifndef __NITF_DATASOURCE_HPP__

00035 namespace nitf
00036 {
00037 
00042 DECLARE_CLASS(DataSource)
00043 {
00044 public:
00046     DataSource(const DataSource & x)
00047     {
00048         setNative(x.getNative());
00049     }
00050 
00052     DataSource & operator=(const DataSource & x)
00053     {
00054         if (&x != this)
00055             setNative(x.getNative());
00056         return *this;
00057     }
00058 
00059     // Set native object
00060     DataSource(nitf_DataSource * x)
00061     {
00062         setNative(x);
00063         getNativeOrThrow();
00064     }
00065 
00067     virtual ~DataSource(){}
00068 
00074     virtual void read(char * buf, nitf::Off size) throw (nitf::NITFException){}
00075 
00076     /*
00077      * Returns the size of the DataSource, in bytes
00078      */
00079     virtual nitf::Off getSize() { return 0; }
00080     virtual void setSize(nitf::Off size) {}
00081 private:
00082 
00084     static NITF_BOOL DataSource_read(NITF_DATA * data,
00085                                      char * buf,
00086                                      nitf::Off size,
00087                                      nitf_Error * error);
00089     static void DataSource_destruct(NITF_DATA* data);
00090     static nitf::Off DataSource_getSize(NITF_DATA* data);
00091     static void DataSource_setSize(NITF_DATA* data, nitf::Off size);
00092 
00093 protected:
00094 
00096     nitf_IDataSource getIDataSource()
00097     {
00098         // Create a data source interface that
00099         // the native layer can use
00100         nitf_IDataSource dataSource =
00101         {
00102             &DataSource_read,
00103             &DataSource_destruct,
00104             &DataSource_getSize,
00105             &DataSource_setSize
00106         };
00107         return dataSource;
00108     }
00109 
00111     DataSource() throw (nitf::NITFException);
00112 
00113     //Here so nothing gets initialized
00114     DataSource(bool b){}
00115 
00116     nitf_Error error;
00117 };

00125 class KnownDataSource : public DataSource
00126 {
00127 public:
00129     KnownDataSource(): DataSource(false), mData(NULL), mIface(NULL){}
00131     virtual ~KnownDataSource() {}
00132 
00138     virtual void read(char * buf, nitf::Off size) throw (nitf::NITFException);
00139

00141      * Returns the size of the segment
00142      */

00144     virtual void setSize(nitf::Off size);
